original_text: Its branches became big and strong. They were strong enough to make a ruler's stick of authority. The vine grew taller than all the other trees around it. Everyone could see that it was very tall and strong. Its branches became big and strong.
korean_text: 그 가지들은 강하여 권세 잡은 자의 규가 될 만한데 그 하나의 키가 굵은 가지 가운데에서 높았으며 많은 가지 가운데에서 뛰어나 보이다가

sentences.original_text: Its branches became big and strong
They were strong enough to make a ruler's stick of authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 통치자의 권위 지팡이를 만들 수 있을 만큼 강했다

sentences.original_text: The vine grew taller than all the other trees around it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 포도나무는 주변의 다른 모든 나무들보다 더 높이 자랐다

sentences.original_text: Everyone could see that it was very tall and strong
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그것이 매우 키가 크고 강하다는 것을 볼 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: Its branches became big and strong
